<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 2"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Drow Shootist Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=2683) <actions string="" />
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Abomination Vaults</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Dedication" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=41" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #165: Eyes of Empty Death](/Sources.aspx?ID=81) pg. 77</row>

**Archetype** [Drow Shootist](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=90)

**Prerequisites**
trained in the [hand crossbow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=69)

</column>

---

Every chance you get, you practice with the hand crossbow to increase your draw speed and accuracy. Whenever you gain a class feature that grants you expert or greater proficiency in a given weapon or weapons, you also gain that proficiency in the [hand crossbow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=69). If you're at least an expert in a hand crossbow you're using, you gain access to its critical specialization effect. You also gain the Shootist's Draw action.

 **Shootist's Draw** <actions string="Single Action" /> **Frequency** once per round; **Effect** You [Interact](/Actions.aspx?ID=80) to draw a hand crossbow and [Strike](/Actions.aspx?ID=89) with it, or you Strike with a loaded hand crossbow you're already holding and then Interact to stow it.

**Special** You can't select another dedication feat until you've gained two other feats from the drow shootist archetype.

<title level="2">Drow Shootist Dedication leads to...</title>
[Lethargy Poisoner](/Feats.aspx?ID=2686), [Reloading Trick](/Feats.aspx?ID=2685), [Repeating Hand Crossbow Training](/Feats.aspx?ID=2684)
name: Drow Shootist Dedication
